name: FIMenuKind
desc: The different kinds of custom menus that the Finder Sync extension can provide.

items.name: case contextualMenuForItems
items.desc: A shortcut menu created when the user control-clicks on an item or a group of selected items inside the Finder window.

items.name: case contextualMenuForContainer
items.desc: A shortcut menu created when the user control-clicks on the Finder window’s background.

items.name: case contextualMenuForSidebar
items.desc: A shortcut menu created when the user control-clicks on an item in the sidebar.

items.name: case toolbarItemMenu
items.desc: A menu created when the user clicks on the extension’s toolbar button.
